text: [Music]
I'm the contemporary artist with a bit
of an unexpected background I was in my
20s before I ever went to an art museum
I grew up in the middle of nowhere on a
dirt road in Ru Arkansas an hour from
the nearest movie theater and I think it
was a great place place to grow up as an
artist because I grew up around quirky
colorful characters who are great at

for instance me and my sister when we

we uh um we were big Greers in our house
and if the TV was on we were watching a
documentary um and
my dad is the most voracious reader I
know he can read a novel or two a day
but when I was little I remember he
would kill flies in our house with my BB
gun and what was so amazing to me about
that well he would be in his recliner
would holler for me to fetch the BB gun
and I'd go get it and what was amazing
to me wasn't well it was pretty kickass
he was killing a fly in the house with a
gun but what was so amazing to me was
that he knew just enough how to pump it
and he could shoot it you know like two
rooms away and not damage what was on
because he knew how to pump it just
enough to kill the fly and not damage
what it was uh landed on so um I should
talk about art
um or we'll be here all day with my

several things that I wasn't getting or
not getting enough of um but two of the

more work that was appealing to a broad

second thing that I was longing for was
more Exquisite craftsmanship and
technique
so um I started uh thinking and listing
what all it was that I thought would

okay I have to have some criteria of how

and what that is is I imagine explaining

minutes and if I can't explain it in 5

uh esoteric and it hasn't been refined
enough yet it needs to be worked on

head Heart and Hand and great art would
